select_trip_date:
Please enter trip date with the format mm/dd/yyyy in Ethiopian Calendar
Examples: 02/09/2014 or 12/28/2014
enter_number_of_passengers: Please enter the number of passengers?
operator_choice: As an Operator, you can sell your bus seats or upload todays trip list
passenger_choice: As a Passenger, you can reserve seats or get your payment approved
number_of_buses_pre: Based on your requirements, There are
number_of_buses_post: Buses available for the selected Date, Do you want to Reserve now?
number_of_buses_singular: Based on your requirements, There is 1 Bus available for the selected Date, Do you want to Reserve now?
no_buses_found: We couldn't find any bus that fits your requirements
bus_book_follow_front: You have made a Reservation for:
bus_book_follow_up:
Thank You for making a Reservation
Please dial *127# and follow the USSD menu to pay ETB %s to our TeleBirr Merchant Account=921212.
Thank You for Booking with GuzoBus.et
enter_booking_pnr_no: Enter the PNR Number you received
enter_customer_pnr_no: Enter the PNR Number your customer received
enter_booking_message: Enter a short message about the Reservation
upload_proof_image: Send a screenshot of the Confirmation
send_image: Please send a picture of the screenshot, not a text message or a file
send_file: Please send a file, not a text message or an image
enter_phone_number: Please Enter your registered phone number in 09xxxxxxxx format
enter_passenger_phone: Please Enter the passengers's phone number in 09xxxxxxxx format
enter_operator_code: Please Enter your registered operator passcode
seat_submitted:
Your Bus information is submitted successfully, our customer care will call you within 3‐5 minutes as needed
Feel free to call us on Our Operators Support line 0912628144
Thank You
name: Name
upload_trip_document: Upload the file that contains the weekly trip list. It can either be a WORD FILE or an EXCEL FILE
weekly_trip_message: Tell us what your trip list is about in a few words.
file_confirmation: You have submitted a file. Click on Submit to Finish
new_weekly_trip: #new_weekly_trip_uploaded New Weekly Trip has been uploaded
weekly_trip_submitted:
Your Weekly trip list is submitted successfully, our customer care will call you within 3‐5 minutes as needed
Feel free to call us on Our Operators Support line 0912628144
Thank You
enter_phone: Please Enter your Phone Number in 09xxxxxxxx format
verify_passenger_details:
By using the link provided below, you can check whether a passenger has paid for a trip by entering: 
The Passenger's phone number
Booking PNR number
wrong_pnr_credentials: There is no valid Reservation on the entered PNR and phone number.
trip_is_verified: The trip has been verified and paied for.
